name: Puddle (itch) (B_Payne)
description:
Puddle is an experimental text/playerless game that meshes poetry, music from Cleenscreen’s Meliza album*, and simple game design in an attempt to create a metaphor for life. You “play” as a Puddle on the ground, hoping to make contact with other bodies of water in order to grow. The player can level up and loop through the levels at their pleasure by pressing the space button. Puddle is more of something to watch than something to play.

Controls:
Space button  to change levels
Q button to Quit
R button to reset the game

Note: Double click the Puddle icon to begin play!

*Cleanscreen, AKA Jamendo’s full album is available for FREE download here: http://archive.org/details/jamendo-074871
